EmailTemplate.description: The following email templates will be used to send email notifications to case owner when customer case closure
EmailTemplate.name: Email Notification for Case Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Case#{!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed - {!Case.Short_Subject__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
The following Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been Closed for {!Case.Account} .
Please refer to the following link for accessing the Case: {!Case.URL_for_Internal_User__c}
Thank you,
